attributes.action: Provide equal funding for both male and female Domestic Violence victims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the same treatment for male and female victims of domestic violence. Whenever domestic violence is talked about people sometimes forget that there are also male victims. There is only one centre for male victims in the whole of the UK, compare that to nearly one in most major town’s for women. We the male victims would like the same amount of funding to be used to create refuges for male victims of domestic violence.
